alert.note: Alert for Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 6:49PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of St. Charles, central Terrebonne, northeastern Lafourche and Jefferson Parishes through 745 PM CST... At 649 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Norco to near Des Allemands to 7 miles northwest of Dulac. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Houma, Cut Off, Avondale, Larose, Metairie, Hahnville, Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Jefferson, Gretna, Harahan, Westwego, Lockport, Jean Lafitte, Mathews, Luling, River Ridge, Boutte and Raceland. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 212 and 230. Interstate 310 between mile markers 1 and 11. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lower Lafourche; Lower Terrebonne; St. Charles; Upper Jefferson; Upper Lafourche; Upper Terrebonne
